title: Beadalon Gold Plated Memory Wire Necklace (.50 Ounces Per Package) - Approximately 18 Loops
features: Can be used for beading projects
Memory wire will spring back to its original shape
description: New plated steel memory wire is perfect when silver or gold color is needed in a memory wire design. By allowing the wire to show through you don't have to use as many beads as before. Plated steel memory wire is perfect for creating rings bracelets necklaces anklets and wine glass charms.
